Name: Magic Stone
Components: V, S, M (one to three pebbles)

Name: Shillelagh
Components: V, S, M (a club or quarterstaff)

Name: Absorb Elements
Casting time: 1 reaction, which you take when you take acid, cold, ethereal, fire, lightning, shadow or sonic damage

Name: Animal Friendship
Components: V, S, F, M (some food, which the target consumes)

Name: Create or Destroy Water
Components: V, S, F, M (a drop of water if creating water)

Name: Snare
Components: V, S, M (25 feet of rope, which the spell consumes)

Name: Dust Devil
Components: V, S, M (a handful of dust/sand/powder, which the spell consumes)

Name: Moonbeam
Components: V, S, M (several seeds of any moonseed plant and a piece of opalescent feldspar)

Name: Erupting Earth
Components: V, S, M (a piece of obsidian)

Name: Stinking Cloud
Components: V, S, M (a skull, a plaguestone, or a piece of material soaked in tainted water)

Name: Summon Animals
Components: V, S, M (a handful of diaspore dust, which the spell consumes, or a diaspore)

Name: Divination
Components: V, S, M (incense and a sacrificial offering appropriate to your religion, together worth at least 25 gp, which the spell consumes)

Name: Stoneskin
Components: V, S, M (a peridot worth 100 gp, which the spell consumes)

Name: Summon Minor Elementals
Components: V, S, M (opal dust worth at least 25 gp, which the spell consumes, or a whole opal gemstone)

Name: Summon Woodland Beings
Components: V, S, F, M (diaspore dust, which the spell consumes, or a whole diaspore gemstone)

Name: Watery Sphere
Components: V, S, M (an aquamarine worth at least 100 gp)

Name: Awaken
Components: V, S, M (a mystic quartz worth at least 1,000 gp, which the spell consumes)

Name: Greater Restoration
Components: V, S, M (diamond dust worth 100 gp, which the spell consumes)

Name: Passwall
Components: V, S, M (a pinch of sesame seeds)

Name: Planar Binding
Components: V, S, F, M (a gemstone worth at least 1,000 gp, which the spell consumes)

Name: Reincarnate
Components: V, S, M (a diamond and a diaspore, each worth at least 500 gp, both of which the spell consumes)

Name: Scrying
Components: V, S, M (either a focus worth at least 10,000 gp, such as a crystal ball,  a silver mirror, or a font filled with holy water, or a cosmic opal worth at least 1,000 gp)

Name: Summon Elemental
Components: V, S, M (either an opal, or consumed gem dust worth 25 gp)

Name: Druid Grove
Components: V, S, M (diaspore dust and moonstone dust, both of which the spell consumes)

Name: Find the Path
Components: V, S, M (a map, compasses worth at least 100 gp and an object from the location you wish to find)

Name: Heroes' Feast
Components: V, S, M (a gem-encrusted bowl worth at least 1,000 gp, which the spell consumes)

Name: Summon Fey
Components: V, S, M (diaspore dust, which the spell consumes, or a whole diaspore gemstone)
